com.adobe.acs.commons.oakpal.checks

Class CompositeStoreAlignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.acs.commons.oakpal.checks.CompositeStoreAlignment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.adamcin.oakpal.core.ProgressCheckFactory

    public final class CompositeStoreAlignment
extends Object
implements net.adamcin.oakpal.core.ProgressCheckFactory
    Report packages which affect paths in more than one composite node store. config items:
    severity
    (default: Violation.Severity#MAJOR) specify the severity of violations reported by this check.
    scopePackageIds (Rule[])
    (default: include all) List of scope rules matching PackageId values (group:name:version) for inclusion in the scope for composite store alignment check.
    mounts ({"name": "path1" [, "path2", ...] } )
    (default: {"apps": ["/apps", "/libs"]}) In a JSON Object, define a named Mount for each key, with the list of paths to assign to the mount. The default mount (named <default>) is implicitly defined and cannot be overridden. By default, this value is configured to simulate future standard AEM deployments where the /apps and /libs root paths are mounted from a separate read-only node store at runtime. .
